title: Netflix/AI
description: Built a Netflix‑style streaming UI with React/Next.js and Tailwind, integrated TMDB for catalog data, and added a GPT‑powered search/assistant that generates personalized movie/series suggestions from prompts; authenticated with Firebase, managed state with Redux/Zustand, and deployed on Render.

title: Sneaker Hub
description: Developed a Sneaker Hub storefront with Next.js and React using TypeScript, designed responsive UIs with Tailwind.

title: Geeko Landing Page
description: Designed and developed the Gecko website landing page with React and Tailwind, featuring a high‑impact hero, value‑driven sections, responsive layouts, and optimized performance/SEO—built fast and deployed seamlessly

title: Weather App
description: Built a worldwide weather app with React/Next.js and TypeScript that provides real‑time conditions, hourly/daily forecasts, and AQI for any location.

title: Portfolio
description: Responsive site built with React, TypeScript, MUI, and GSAP to showcase skills, projects, and achievements with a modern UI.
